item.title: National Investment Council
item.description: The president appoints the following to the National Investment Council Name Title Ahmed Farah, Member Karen Taylor, Member Sarah Ochieng, Member Eva Warigia, Member Sheila Kyarisiima, Member David Langat, Member Sitoyo Lopokoiyit, M-Pesa Africa MD Member Paul Russo, KCB CEO Member Tom Mulwa, Member Humphrey Kariuki, Member Peter Njonjo.

item.title: Nairobi River Commission
item.description: On 2nd-December-2022, William-Ruto creates Nairobi River Commission Name Pamela A. Olet (Dr.) Chairperson Mumo Musuva (Dr.

item.title: Governers
item.description: About Council of Governors The Council of County Governors (COG) is a non-partisan organisation established under Section 19 of the Intergovernmental Relations Act (IGRA 2012).

item.title: Member Of Parliament
item.description: This is the 13 parliament of Kenya. There are currently 290 members elected by registered votes , 47 women elected by registered voters from the counties, 12 members nominated by parliamentary political parties to represent special interests of youth, persons with disabilities and workers, and the Speaker of the National Assembly.

item.title: Musalia Mudavadi
item.description: About Wycliffe Musalia Mudavadi (born 21 September 1960) is a Kenyan politician and land economist who is currently serving as the Prime Cabinet Secretary of Kenya.

item.title: Ruto Interesting Sightings
item.description: 2022-12-18 Ruto in Qatar, source unknown. Widely shared on social media. 2022-12-18 Ruto in Qatar with Tanzanian. Mohammed Dewji Twitter Archive

item.title: William Ruto
item.description: About William Kipchirchir Samoei Arap Ruto CGH (born 21 December 1966) is a Kenyan politician who is serving as the fifth and current president of Kenya since 13 September 2022.

item.title: Cabinet
item.description: Cabinet Secretaries appointed by William-Ruto, with effect from 27th October 2022. No. Cabinet Secretary Ministry 1.

item.title: Executive office
item.description: As set out in the Executive Order No. 1 of 2022 on the Organisation of Government of Kenya, the Executive Office of the President comprises of the Office of the President, the Office of the Deputy President, and the Office of the Prime Cabinet Secretary.

item.title: IEBC
item.description: 2nd December 2022 President William Ruto has appointed High Court Judge Aggrey Muchelule to chair a tribunal that will investigate IEBC Commissioners.

item.title: Key activities
item.description: Government Appointments Below is a list of appointments to various government offices. This list may not be comprehensive. 2022 No.

item.title: National Police Service
item.description: 14th October 2022 William-Ruto appoints Amin Mohammed Ibrahim as Director, Directorate of Criminal Investigations. (DCI). Tweet 2nd November 2022 The following were appointed to the National Police Service.

item.title: Principal Secretaries
item.description: Appointed 1st December, 2022. No. Names Ministry 1 Teresia Mbaika Malokwe, Devolution 2 Julius Kiplangat Korir, Cabinet Affairs 3 Esther Mumbi Ngero, Performance and Delivery Management 4 Aurelia Chepkirui Rono, Parliamentary Affairs 5 Raymond Vicky Ojwang’ Omollo (Dr.

item.title: Rigathi Gachagua
item.description: About His Excellency Rigathi Gachagua is the Deputy President of the Republic of Kenya. He was elected as the running mate to President William Ruto on August 9, 2022, and sworn in on September 13, 2022.

item.title: ✈️ President Travels
item.description: List of countries the president William-Ruto has visited. All locations listed here are historical and public. No private information is provided here.
